import React, { Component } from 'react' import formatCurrency from '../util' import Fade from 'react-reveal/Fade' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { removeFromCart } from '../redux/cart/cart' import {useForm} from 'react-hook-form' class Cart extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { name: '', email: '', address: '', showCheckout: false } } handleInput = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } createOrder = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const order = { name: this.state.name, email: this.state.email, address: this.state.address, cartItems: this.props.cartItems } this.props.createOrder(order) } render() { const { cartItems } = this.props return (
{cartItems.length === 0 ? (
Cart is empty
) : (
You have {cartItems.length} in the cart
)}
    {cartItems.map((item) => (
  • {item.title}
    {formatCurrency(item.price)} x {item.count}{' '}
    • ))}
{cartItems.length !== 0 && (
Total: {formatCurrency(cartItems.reduce((a, c) => a + c.price * c.count, 0))}
{this.state.showCheckout && (
)}
)}
) } } export default connect( (state) => ({ cartItems: state.cart.cartItems }), { removeFromCart } )(Cart)
